name: Nissedor
description:
Nissedor is an Elf Care Simulation crafted for the Virtual Pet Jam

The features:
- Feed the Nisse
- Play with the Nisse (Hide and Seek. He is not very good at it...)
- Inquire about the well-being of the Nisse
- Recommend the Nisse takes a nap.

Source:

https://github.com/Torbuntu/Nissedor_virtualpetjam

note:

Assets are CC0 collected from https://opengameart.org/
